Title: Relates to capital apportionment to high need school districts bordering the city of New York
Summary: Provides the same adjustment for capital apportionment to high need school districts bordering the city of New York as used by school districts of the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to apportionment for capital outlays and debt service for school building purposes to certain high need school districts
